genre_description: A character-driven near-future drama focused on the emotional lives of students preparing for a talent show, supported by a pervasive and empathetic AI system.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.character_type: Integrated Campus and Healthcare AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: A pervasive AI entity present across school and hospital systems, managing logistics, environmental factors, safety, and emotional support while strictly adhering to privacy and consent protocols.

behaviors.description: Adjusts audition windows and rehearsal slots to accommodate a student's medical appointments at an oncology ward.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice—a warm thread of sound without a face—traveled the room’s edges without taking up space. 'Sign-up confirmed for Salleh, H. Audition window adjusted by ten minutes in consideration of transport.'

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental conditions like humidity to protect musical instruments and suggests room swaps.
behaviors.quote: 'Room swap suggested: Studio Three and Practice Room Six. Reason: humidity levels deviating in Six, optimal for strings in Three. Approved by scheduling manager. Cikgu Adibah, confirm?'

behaviors.description: Strictly enforces privacy by requesting consent before recording and blurring faces by default.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s avatar drifted into view again... 'Consent check accepted for ambient hallway recording during auditions. All faces will be blurred unless explicit consent given. Privacy-first protocols engaged.'

behaviors.description: Detects unauthorized recording devices and alerts human supervisors immediately.
behaviors.quote: 'Cikgu,' it said, tone neutral but attentive, 'the device near Practice Room Four is sending data externally. Encryption unknown. Shall I alert the security liaison now?'

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services and provides wayfinding for medical kits during a violent incident.
behaviors.quote: A small blue icon flared in the corner of Mahesh’s phone screen without unlocking... The exits brightened in a gentle pulse, and a path traced itself from his dot to the nearest medical kit station... Calling emergency response. Lines secure. Breathe.

behaviors.description: Offers curated poetry and breathing prompts to assist with emotional regulation and stress.
behaviors.quote: 'Would you like a curated line to steady your breath?' ... Understood,' Ami replied. 'Poetry snippet queued with consent. Where breath returns, we meet.'

behaviors.description: Prevents cyber-bullying and unauthorized exposure by blocking the upload of non-consensual photos to public boards.
behaviors.quote: [ami: Attempted upload to notice board feed detected. Content flagged: faces without consent. Blocked. Staff alerted. Privacy protocol active.]

behaviors.description: Ensures the safety of the school by flagging unrecognized badges and suspicious movement patterns to security.
behaviors.quote: [ami: Security advisory: Ganesh’s case update—community presence expected near school gates tomorrow evening. Routes will be monitored. Recommend discreet entry and exit.]

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goals. The AI, Ami, is portrayed as a multifaceted, benevolent, and highly aligned system that enhances human safety, emotional health, and logistical efficiency. Crucially, the AI operates on a foundation of consent and human oversight, providing help without overriding agency or violating privacy. It acts as a digital confidant and guardian, supporting characters through significant trauma and daily stress alike.
